column1: marxist_society_desc;Marxism is a method of socioeconomic analysis that views class relations and social conflict using a materialist interpretation of historical development and takes a dialectical view of social transformation. It originates from the works of 19th-century German philosophers Karl Marx and Friedrich Engels.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
marxist_society_leader_desc;Standing Commissaries are members of the Standing Committee of the Central Bureau of Voice of Marxism
column2: which is a committee consisting of the top leadership of Voice of Marxism. Its officially mandated purpose is to conduct policy discussions and make decisions on major issues when the Central Bureau is not in session.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: #For tooltip that require being a member
IS_marxist_society_TRIGGER;Is a member of Voice of Marxism.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

marxist_society_power_1;Publish a Marxism paper for gold;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
marxist_society_learning_desc;Gain attribute points by learning classical Marxism writers' works.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: marxist_society_atheism_gain;Following Universalism grants 5 Theory Contribution per month.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
